title: Rek'Sion and Udyr/Panth are two of the most-fun lanes ever.
body:
Rek knocks them up while Sion charges his Q, enemy gets CCed for 4-6 seconds while they get bursted down.

Udyr bear stuns the ADC and starts smacking him. ADC runs away (preferably flashes too!) then Panth jumps  on him. Then Udyr stuns again.
